name: Plunder Inc.
description:
NOTE: I don't think this one works. I made it in high school in like 2018, I basically was trying to make Fall Guys and then I realized that making Fall Guys is hard. Unprivating for archival purposes.

A 2-Player LAN game. Battle it out in 5 different minigames.

Floor Crumble: The floor is falling apart! Stay off the unstable red platforms.

Disco Dash: Get to the color called as fast as possible!

Cannon Dodge: You've been captured by an enemy pirate. Dodge their cannonballs!

Paint War: Prove you're swabbing skills are superior by swabbing your color more!

Box Escape: There's only one way out. Jump on your opponent's head!

To Play: Make sure you have unreal engine installed, and you let the program communicate over the WiFi on both computers. On the main menu, set the bottom button to LAN mode. Have one computer hit play, and let the other find the game.

Note; This was my first multiplayer project, and my first in a 3D engine, and I mostly made it to teach myself how it works.
